meanings.sent1: I love to eat berlins for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells delicious berlins with various fillings.
meanings.sent3: When I bit into the berlin, jelly oozed out unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked berlins filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sprinkles on the berlin made it look irresistible.

meanings.sent1: Berlin is known for its rich history.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists visit Berlin to explore its landmarks.
meanings.sent3: I dream of visiting Berlin one day and experiencing its culture.
meanings.sent4: In Berlin, the blend of old and new architecture is captivating.
meanings.sent5: The bustling streets of Berlin are always full of life.

meanings.definition: A type of pastry filled with jelly or cream
meanings.sent1: The bakery offers a variety of berlins with different fillings.
meanings.sent2: I prefer berlins with cream filling over jelly.
meanings.sent3: As a treat, I indulged in a berlin filled with rich cream.
meanings.sent4: The sweetness of the berlin with jelly was just right.
meanings.sent5: The creamy filling in the berlin melted in my mouth.
